comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/zzfpython>@zzfpython</denchmark-link> thank you, these are python default values that are used in the function in the absence of specifying an argument. So if you create an instance of LoadImagesAndLabels() without specifying a value for , it will be False.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/zzfpython>@zzfpython</denchmark-link> don't alter these values. To get started see <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/Train-Custom-Data>https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/Train-Custom-Data</denchmark-link>
